abstract.p: Euro RSCG Tatham in Chicago, part of Euro RSCG Worldwide unit of Havas Advertising, is acquiring McConnaughy Stein Schmidt Brown in Chicago (S)

block.p: Euro RSCG Tatham in Chicago, part of the Euro RSCG Worldwide unit of Havas Advertising, is acquiring McConnaughy Stein Schmidt Brown in Chicago. Terms were not disclosed.

McConnaughy Stein, with 30 employees and billings estimated at more than $90 million from clients like A. T. Kearney and Walgreen, will be absorbed into the existing operations of Euro RSCG Tatham, and run, at least for now, under that name.
Euro RSCG Tatham in Chicago, part of the Euro RSCG Worldwide unit of Havas Advertising, is acquiring McConnaughy Stein Schmidt Brown in Chicago. Terms were not disclosed.

McConnaughy Stein, with 30 employees and billings estimated at more than $90 million from clients like A. T. Kearney and Walgreen, will be absorbed into the existing operations of Euro RSCG Tatham, and run, at least for now, under that name.

Jim Schmidt, 42, executive vice president and creative director at McConnaughy Stein, was named chief creative officer at Euro RSCG Tatham, succeeding Robert H. Welke, who left unexpectedly in March. Tom McConnaughy, 58, chairman and chief creative officer at McConnaughy Stein, was named to the new post of chief integration officer.
